arts.ttl: Flick talks Lamine, Bernal, De la Fuente ahead of Sevilla vs Barcelona – ‘Don’t know if he’ll be ready for El Clasico’
arts.sum: After their defeat to PSG in the UEFA Champions League, FC Barcelona are back in action on Sunday as they take on Sevilla in La Liga. Having tasted their first loss of the season in midweek, the Catalan giants will be intent on producing a strong reaction and going into the international break on the […] The post Flick talks Lamine, Bernal, De la Fuente ahead of Sevilla vs Barcelona – ‘Don’t know if he’ll be ready for El Clasico’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona defensive talent not in first-team training ahead of Sevilla clash
arts.sum: A while ago, FC Barcelona began their final training session in the lead-up to Sunday’s La Liga encounter against Sevilla away from home. Having lost their previous match against PSG in the UEFA Champions League, the Blaugrana will be intent on bouncing back to winning ways immediately. However, they will have to do so without […] The post Barcelona defensive talent not in first-team training ahead of Sevilla clash appeared first on Barca Universal.
